statements: SELECT * FROM WorkoutSchedule;
SELECT athlete_name, class_timing FROM WorkoutSchedule WHERE workout_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WorkoutSchedule WHERE location = 'Gym';
SELECT athlete_name, trainer_name FROM WorkoutSchedule WHERE class_timing BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT workout_id, location FROM WorkoutSchedule WHERE athlete_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM WorkoutSchedule WHERE athlete_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT athlete_name, class_timing FROM WorkoutSchedule WHERE trainer_name = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT workout_id, location FROM WorkoutSchedule WHERE class_timing BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM WorkoutSchedule ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM WorkoutSchedule WHERE location LIKE '%Gym%' AND athlete_name <> 'Alice Smith';
SELECT * FROM Athletes
SELECT athlete_name, class_id FROM Athletes
SELECT * FROM Athletes WHERE class_id = 1
SELECT athlete_name, trainer_id FROM Athletes ORDER BY trainer_id DESC
SELECT class_id, class_time FROM ClassSchedule
SELECT * FROM Athletes WHERE class_id = 1 AND location_id = 3;
SELECT athlete_name, class_id, trainer_id FROM Athletes WHERE class_id > 2 ORDER BY trainer_id DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, class_time FROM Athletes JOIN ClassSchedule ON Athletes.class_id = ClassSchedule.class_id;
SELECT athlete_name, trainer_id FROM Athletes WHERE location_id = 2 AND trainer_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM ClassSchedule WHERE class_time > '10:00:00' AND location_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_id, name, age FROM Athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT name, gender FROM Athletes ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClassTimings WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT trainer_name, expertise, experience_years FROM Trainers WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY experience_years ASC;
SELECT * FROM Athletes WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT trainer_name, expertise FROM Trainers WHERE experience_years >= 5;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM ClassTimings ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, name, gender FROM Athletes WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY gender, name;
SELECT trainer_id, trainer_name, expertise, experience_years FROM Trainers WHERE expertise LIKE '%gym%'
SELECT * FROM class_timings;
SELECT class_time, class_duration FROM class_timings ORDER BY class_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM trainers WHERE trainer_specialization = 'Yoga';
SELECT trainer_name, trainer_specialization FROM trainers ORDER BY trainer_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM class_timings WHERE class_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT trainer_name, trainer_specialization FROM trainers ORDER BY trainer_specialization DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM locations WHERE location_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT athlete_id, class_id, schedule_date FROM workout_schedules WHERE duration < INTERVAL '1 hour';

SELECT * FROM class_timings, trainers, locations WHERE class_timings.class_id = trainers.trainer_id AND trainers.trainer_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY trainers.trainer_name ASC, locations.location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, email, phone_number FROM athletes;
SELECT athlete_id, dob, email FROM athletes WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE trainer_id = 3;
SELECT class_name, trainer_id, location_id FROM classes ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_name, email FROM athletes WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';

SELECT athlete_name, phone_number, class_name FROM athletes JOIN athlete_schedule ON athletes.athlete_id = athlete_schedule.athlete_id JOIN classes ON classes.class_id = athlete_schedule.class_id WHERE classes.trainer_id = 2;
SELECT athlete_name, email, schedule_date FROM athletes JOIN athlete_schedule ON athletes.athlete_id = athlete_schedule.athlete_id WHERE athlete_schedule.is_attended = TRUE;
SELECT trainer_name, specialization FROM trainers WHERE trainer_id IN (SELECT trainer_id FROM classes WHERE location_id = 3 OR location_id = 4);
